entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
